name: 戚務正
objective: 本課程介紹工程與科學相關之主要地球物理方法及應用，包含震測，重力，熱流，及磁力。透過實例問題之解析，使學生除了具有理論的基礎外，同時有能力藉著數值分析方法來解決工程問題。
schedule:
week 0: semester start meeting
week 1: holiday
week 2: seismic principle
week 3: seismic refraction
week 4: seismic reflection part 1
week 5: seismic reflection part 2
week 6: midterm
week 7: course project discussion
week 8: seismic interpretation and ground penetrating radar
scorePolicy: based on homework and one midterm
materials: Introduction to Applied Geophysics: Exploring The Shallow Subsurface  Edition: w/ CD-ROM Authors: Burger, H R; Sheehan, A F.; Jones, C H. ISBN10:  0393926370
